meanings.sent1: The overthick fog made it hard to see the road ahead.
meanings.sent2: The overthick blanket kept me warm all night.
meanings.sent3: The overthick peanut butter sandwich was impossible to eat!
meanings.sent4: Her overthick hair resembled a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent5: The overthick mud stuck to my shoes like glue.

meanings.definition: To make something too thick or dense
meanings.sent1: She accidentally overthickened the soup by adding too much flour.
meanings.sent2: Please be careful not to overthick the paint with too many layers.
meanings.sent3: The chef overthickened the sauce, turning it into a gooey mess.
meanings.sent4: His emotions overthickened, making it hard for him to express himself.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds overthickened, signaling an impending downpour.
